name: Bygone
description:
A cube is facing all its vulnerabilities in a road by making choices and bear the consequences.

Created for BUG Fall Jam 2018 with Unity. The theme was “Box.”

In the design phase, we think about all our deepest flaws and put it in the game. Movement is with W, A, S and D keys.

Coding: Fırat Alpaydın

Design: Özgür Erdönmez, Efe Alaçamlı, Fırat Alpaydın

Audio & Music: Efe Alaçamlı

Thanks to Göktuğ Demir, Nezih Abi and Murat Çelebi!
